note.p: Irish-born? gardener. Employed by William Wells, who created a garden at Redleaf, Penshurst, Kent. Grandfather of Herbert George Wells (1866–1946; ODNB).
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/), 1851 (HO107/1609/273/8)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 September 2018)
